title: Calculus Problem Set #5
description: Complete exercises 1-20 from Chapter 7. Show all work and provide detailed explanations for word problems.

title: Physics Lab Report - Momentum
description: Write a comprehensive lab report on the momentum conservation experiment conducted in class. Include data analysis and conclusion.

title: Shakespeare Essay - Hamlet Analysis
description: Write a 1500-word essay analyzing the theme of revenge in Hamlet. Use specific examples from the text to support your arguments.

title: World War II Research Project
description: Create a presentation on a specific battle or event from World War II. Include primary sources and historical context.

title: Chemical Reactions Lab
description: Complete the chemical reactions lab worksheet and submit your observations and conclusions.
